content: So what will you do?,pic.twitter.com/AwElsZPCIe
The guy with the fracture leg.
Why
Aik tou wo handicapped hai aur kisi bhi waqt gir sakta hai dusra wo larka hai
Hahaha buddhi aunty bhi toe gir sakti hain
But fracture leg should be immobilized cz of the risk of malunion of his bones. Aur agar aisa hua tou he might have a chance of losing his leg in the future
Aunty guzar gye toe?
Aunty ne wesy bhi umar guzaari hui hai but the guy is young
Hahaha yeh bhi Sahi hai

None of them, the one with the baby is a fake, its just one of those toy babies, the old woman is a witch disguising her broom as a walking stick, the man with the plaster is on his way to make a false injury claim with a fake cast and the last man is a professional beggar! :)
How and why so negative?

Given that it was unlikely to be faced with 4 people all needing your seat and needing to decide who to give it too, I thought I would give the option that they are not all genuine. The other option is to get another 3 people to get off their seat, so they all have a seat, Sorted
The later option is better.
Agreed, and would have been the option I would have made in reality.
Either go for everyone or none.

Pichli seat khali hai.. 
Udhar line bunao
Aur peche koi Hua toe?

One can say, i am ugly
I mean I am on an ugly seat. Try the pichli seat
Seat toe deni hai Har Hal mein
As a standard practice I would give to the Pregnant khatoon. Baqi uss ki marzi she sacrifices to others or not.
That's better
No one.. i’m the one who paid for it so i alone deserve this. Whether i give it to someone in respect is a different matter.
Out of respect kisko doge

To C. A has a baby but still young & can still stand, B is Old lady but not disabled & looks perfectly fine, D looks poor & old but healthy enough to put on suit & go out.
C is the only one who need some assistance bcoz he’s unable to even stand on his legs.
Not bad.

It is a good choice. A feminist will say A bcoz she thinks only women feel pain & men are not human, they can’t understand a man’s sufferings & struggle. I read a reply of her. 
But a sensible person will say C.
Women can manage on her own anyway in this regard from now on. As a matter of fact mostly people in this situation will not leave the seat

Yeah i know.. and it’s not bad bcoz this seat is originally his. Like i said no one deserves this seat except me bcoz i paid for it. And it’s up to me if I wanna give it to someone. If I don’t wanna then i’m not committing a crime bcoz it was mine to begin with.
A cos she has a baby and I think she is pregnant too.
But pregnant lady can stand

mujhy to peechy wali seat khali nazar aarahi hai ...  wahan kyun nahi baith jata koi.. 
Ajeeb pangay baazi hai
Nahi Hai Khali

A 
Her life is already hard babies are annoying.
Don't have them
I'll give it to C and then ask him to hold the baby for the lady if she is okay with it ofcourse.
That's a good idea
If the lady is pregnant then A because if she falls her both babies can have serious injuries. And too much load for her already.
Ahan
I'll show a nice middle finger and sit down myself.
Haha that was quite expected from you
I'll leave my seat and let them fight for it.
Cool :p
Zombie duhh
Only you are going for him
Because he's the only one who can kill me
Apni seat handicapped wale guy ko dunga or barabr wali buddhi ko dilwa dunga bol kr itna to dabaang hu Abhi , or bache wali aunty ko bhi dilwa dunga
Guy with the fracture leg
Woman holding child.
Handicap
Umm me i guess! Kyon k mera stop aane wala hy! Phir they can fight and decide k kon bethe ga!?
Fracture waley bhai ko seat de k bacha uski god me bithao or tension mukao
Give seat to boy with kid so lady become relaxed too
